rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11}

unitName: Introduction to occupational health and safety
description: The effects and human cost of occupational disease and injury, occupational health and safety law, worker's compensation, negligence, occupational rehabilitation, historical achievements and challenges, international and national organisations.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
